R.002118

----------

Name: publisher fixes
Created by: Heather Braum

----------

Group: Administrative Reports
     Fix Bib Records-admin

Created on: 2013-11-21 00:15:29
Modified on: 2017-12-18 15:38:47
Date last run: -

----------

Public: 0
Expiry: 0

----------



----------

SELECT biblio.biblionumber, CONCAT ('<a href=\"/cgi-bin/koha/catalogue/detail.pl?biblionumber=',biblio.biblionumber,'\" target="_blank">'"link to record"'</a>') AS "Link to Record",  biblio.title, CONCAT('<a href=\"/cgi-bin/koha/catalogue/search.pl?idx=ti&q=',biblio.title,'&sort_by=title_az\" target="_blank">',biblio.title,'</a>') AS "Title Search", ExtractValue(biblio_metadata.metadata,'//datafield[@tag="260"]/subfield[@code>="c"]') AS publisher, biblio.author, CONCAT('<a href=\"/cgi-bin/koha/catalogue/search.pl?idx=au&q=',biblio.author,'&sort_by=title_az\" target="_blank">',biblio.author,'</a>') AS "Author Search", count(items.itemnumber) AS "items count" FROM biblio LEFT JOIN biblio_metadata USING(biblionumber) LEFT JOIN items USING(biblionumber) WHERE items.homebranch='SENECA' AND biblio.biblionumber IN ('528111','34396','240920','27614','152904','434685','434684','434683','145301','310888','19890','124195','309096','370155','241007','533036','312778','176748','189993','306520','312860','306325','138097','312926','239166','237260','309080','425977','94896','310274','278397','549222','54437','6277','173093','312908','457060','473288','551750','576282','533110','297404','311000','307600','43729','91787','103462','85742','188487','254368','254369','254370','87693','222793','584583','236339','213191','309303','238863','163828','190536','149742','100160','152993','100600','307277','100123','432630','480821','178067','3118','83880','4391','979','240709','85239','180548','286591','175413','13443','164873','21821','97994','306550','306909','13077','306341','267195','13120','147617','13852','291301','61936','46136','91649','113615','83521','94397','175555','61394','48003','133856','129025','182141','130855','148652','288860','193145','240917','47061','361818','245466','185894','23283','329555','134729','308681','231636','186827','88011','68558','190333','234289','87616','265883','27331','138779','220052','67641','430032','186550','188329','136524','58785','136504','136811','188810','464759','188266','140519','324977','196708','58165','144662','137945','188507','310030','188227','311003','310567','142470','245153','67634','187701','143480','140612','47456','150459','71763','284411','284410','312876','311357','309670','310800','310801','27661','357510','309844','312465','190424','497913','142130','109212','115434','144879','241258','92375','2421','164868','192450','255039','142469','147233','190279','190184','140842','165136','164848','141986','144043','190086','2100','312226','312061','294289','7263','151430','193356','254412','3309','288894','30105','5685','309294','2090','311785','150984','309833','1874','1806','2108','1877','57752','93028','1885','2087','57182','430148','47148','194084','151406','1813','1658','265719','1887','151551','8610','62512','72547','27543','22116','242277','222669','28032','273740','29292','302680','310496','310531','310586','310406','310383','59378','87812','87811','72113','60536','310262','68421','88155','311485','311374','114325','311528','81411','310917','75144','311138','311139','118098','118099','260575','114036','268930','312639','352754','196357','196686','352278','311495','500088','299311','355165','339917','302395','350098','354950','447686','447687','376836','373621','376833','377020','468432','458814','468379','452736','460478','469975','456665','492147','449927','492486','539316','456664','456663','467627','514412','449369','531323','504958','519526','508105','518487','515710','515713','498691','523414','520571','520572','520570','520565','520573','520569','520566','513970','501517','500635','528790','576340','575120','576339','537955','577110','445173','443359','463588','458406','446935','446936','448041','427764','467666','160334','123381','303757','8962','47066','307770','16725','1420','306250','306028','547655','39306','144847','96726','162682','160624','247679','40684','306858','21870','478909','193631','64591','370186','97633','444446','155201','183592','13118','311915','517109','590573','509195','578204','546573','579900','153223','176338','143727','173919','312514','57917','458027','138287','311509','547432','18880','126008','19524','16308','160648','353737','352260','353740','353738','356344','356351','358331','360155','360147','360152','360156','369434','369431','360148','360153','360144','372311','372309','372312','372318','372313','434669','446578','454850','532522','532409','551236','579751','581548','589350','593255','593252','593254','183912','307474','24887','215346','308664','24717','78794','311669','457867','307898','486726','486713','501809','309309','538110','581739','590434','580046','580470','589034','583088','589384','551281','581070','578164','586004','553370','581658','587283','579826','579810','309410','577361','144676','581338','576533','588611','584564','590580','529462','582226','581611','529475','588711','577691','309177','309041','309042','309176','579231','584678','58241','579852','309225','309222','309226','588098','583090','538111','589952','538326','590584','579951','579274','579536','574589','170980','578147','553133','579537','583019','586127','577347','549429','590924','574820','581553','142464','583817','583955','590390','587984','587295','466337','579275','581364','587558','529478','576336','585405','550996','553053','529371','174432','594047','592588','579539','586003','178894','581542','594046','471039','592589','576960','547741','170918','309003','587667','308755','530351','585895','585187','583811','575554','589346','581807','585096','553290','591868','181135','575082','586369','588758','582620','593609','308034','309766','575477','549428','584685','590198','505960','576954','585303','582364','575606','537915','581522','590181','585821','580512','585371','550568','584217','581685','586277','550539','579250','369025','311310','491140','579541','585863','588099','587935','581672','369196','582203','329401','577518','583820','593542','588101','587147','587148','587983','590909','587222','576951','309777','551654','589881','587109','72747','594051','589785','307685','579808','587219','587982','594200','593199','591975','591977','589383','589816','593843','593344','581599','590180','446188','588999','583922','590149','581680','491142','577989','585373','593607','427570','576531','588123','589878','335536','587301','588528','553292','579759','434671','583822','580337','529480','137938','593606','589891','577931','577699','576111','590926','354119','579809','582367','589630','575001','591979','592822','582183','586615','309288','590087','427704','580786','579202','551812','309232','579762','585869','585004','581695','579897','581461','445678','578011','546561','547457','584233','576957','590555','581679','551044','588449','579229','312587','130965','311050','309728','581144','582363','587111','593600','141126','575561','590287','549860','305307','583021','584684','587281','576350','583126','592614','308723','580067','549862','546804','549866','590928','579355','581187','581147','582168','582372','581758','586612','310087','576104','587296','586131','586129','590930','590152','577465','579542','585003','310632','579269','577344','584403','310744','592418','550994','582425','308878','575007','51193','588705','589632','553310','576961','585743','580400','579760','575966','312291','308154','580356','579113','582369','309216','582331','576958','575080','576349','588129','586693','578016','583826','173323','146447','593253','590094','423045','587713','579353','172199','578788','581593','588001','576682','583042','576532','427263','590387','312701','579771','576101','306613','584680','594256','582370','592147','581677','575600','594042','575610','98662','592610','311043')
GROUP BY biblio.biblionumber
ORDER BY biblio.title
